experience.title: General Manager - Corporate Development
experience.description: Presently, working for the Corporate Development Unit of Al-Futtaim Group with key task of identifying, evaluating and recommending investment, acquisition and divesture opportunities to achieve strategic growth across group's diversified businesses in Automotive, Retail, Engineering, Electronics, Technology, Financial services and Real estate development.Previously, was an active member in the Investment Management team of US $ 500 million Al-Futtaim MENA Real Estate Development Private Equity Fund. Gained extensive experience in financial feasibility, valuation, due diligence and debt raising for mixed use mega real estate projects in the Middle east, Levant and North AfricaAl-Futtaim Investment Management Limited is registered in Dubai International Financial Center and regulated by Dubai Financial Services Authority

Gained extensive experience in financial feasibility, valuation, due diligence and debt raising for mixed use mega real estate projects in the Middle east, Levant and North AfricaAl-Futtaim Investment Management Limited is registered in Dubai International Financial Center and regulated by Dubai Financial Services Authority

experience.title: Investment Analyst
experience.description: Dubai festival city is the Middle East largest privately funded mixed-use real estate development spread on a 1,300 acres land with an estimated project cost of US $ 12 billion. Envisaged as a “city within a city” concept, the development encompasses five star hotels & resorts, commercial parks, residential, retail parks, schools, golf course and clubhouse in its project portfolio.I was a member of Asset Management team of DFC, responsible for financial feasibility, due diligence, budget reporting, Joint Venture structuring and debt raising for $ 1 billion worth of projects

experience.title: Consultant
experience.description: Conducted a special assignment for Deloitte's client J.Ray Mcdermott, a US multi national company having its operation at Jebel Ali, UAE. The scope of work includes preparation of financial statements as per US GAAP for reporting to Securities Exchange Commission, USA.

experience.title: Assistant Manager - Finance, Indian operations
experience.description: Responsible for setting up and management of Indian finance and accounting operations of Suez-Tractebel Indian subsidiary, Tractebel Engineers and Constructors Private Limited. Gained extensive experience in financial management, international and domestic corporate taxation.

experience.title: Audit Incharge and Trainee
experience.description: Gained audit experience in hospitality, engineering and manufacturing industry while as a Trainee during August'97 to August'2000 and thereafter as audit in charge.
